comment: *I actually took CHIN 2002* Literally one of the best profs there is. Genuinely a great person and she's funny! I'm not the best at Chinese but I enjoyed her course and am so glad I got to take it with her. She is also great for intro courses, btw.

Xie laoshi is a great teacher! She is funny, kind, and cares for her students. If you participate and study, the tests and exams are easy. You have a quiz each day, but they're easy as long as you review your vocab. Xie laoshi also helps you review a bit before each quiz. She is a wonderful teacher and has inspired me to continue learning Chinese!
she honestly really want you to do well in the class. She is very passionate about what she teaches and very good at it. There are daily quizzes but they are vocab from the last class.

Professor Xie is very enthusiastic and makes learning Chinese very fun. As another person said, she tends to go on tangents, but they never detract from the necessary material, and they are usually interesting things about Chinese culture, food, and life.
Love this teacher, would definitely take her class again.
She is really sweet and caring and makes learning Chinese easy and fun. Would 100% take her again and recommend her to others.

I had Professor Xie for Chinese 1001; she was very sweet and easy to get along with. She gives homework every week but it's very easy and doesn't take long to do. She has daily quizzes but they are not hard. She makes learning new characters easy as she makes it really easy to remember. Would 100% take her again and recommend her to anyone.

I love Professor Xie! She is so sweet and genuinely cares about the class. It is clear she enjoys sharing Chinese culture with students and she is always giving extra little stories to help connect with us. I would recommend her EVERY TIME. Hopefully I can take her for a later Chinese class :D
Really good teacher, she made Chinese really easy. The teaching was very good and easy to understand. As a Chinese major I feel like this class set me up well for the future.

Prof. Xie is very enthusiastic about Chinese, and therefore makes for a great teacher. She does however go on little tangents about unrelated vocabulary at times, but it is enjoyable and you learn a lot. Quizzes almost every day, but simple.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Best Chinese prof. there is. Shes really caring about her students and her lectures help you understand the content. Not a lot of hw but quizzes almost daily (not hard just vocab)

Great and supportive teacher. Pr. Xie made the class challenging, fun and interesting. Many quizzes, but they really help keep up with the amount of vocabulary taught in this class. Fair exams with many different question types, so you can do well even if you're weaker on certain things. 100% recommend if you're serious about learning Chinese.

She's really nice, helpful, and good at teaching. Learning another language, especially a language so foreign to English as Chinese, is hard; but she teaches it in a good way. Just don't skip class or else you'll regret it.
